someone you love or would like to have a romantic relationship with: The message on the card said "Be my Valentine!"
(also valentine card) a decorative card that you send, sometimes without your name on it, on 14 February (Valentine's Day) to someone you love: Did you get any valentines? I left a valentine card in her locker.
